comments_since_last_sample.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.
I'm concerned about the notion that people need to be told that a suggestion based on their name is based on their name. Have we sunken too low to recognize our own names now?
Ok Mr. Double Molasses, you just DOXXed yourself
I've never even seen a recommended username unless the one I've chosen is unavailable and they've always been as close as possible to the one I chose in the first place
That has never once been the case for me. Maybe my email address, but even that is uncommon.
